input_args.passage: 'Mark E. Mitchell is a former senior executive in DOD who ... | Mark E. Mitchell is a former senior executive in DOD who served most recently as the Acting Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense for Special Operations and Low-Intensity Conflict (ASD(SO/LIC)). input_args.claim: "From, we learn that this battle was a part of the United States-led coalition forces' intervention to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan."
